description:
BRAND NEW: Over 6,500 students since our recent launch.

THE MOST COMPREHENSIVE SOCIAL MEDIA COURSE ON UDEMY - Fully updated during May 2015 and again October 2015.

Ready to take your business viral? Harness the power of social media with our extensive social media course. Everything from Twitter and Facebook to blogging, social media automation, G+ and content marketing.

Are you ready to become part of the next-generation of business leaders? Harness the power of social media for your business, organisation and career.

Join our latest social media course with UNLIMITED & LIFETIME access you will learn how to drive sales, attract new customers and master social media.

FULL 30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE.

Social media sites such as Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Youtube, Pinterest and G+ all have thousands of customers waiting for you to explore.

This course is the most comprehensive look at all of the social media websites, brand new for May 2015.

What does this course give you?

  • Introduction to social media
  • Auditing your organisation
  • NEW: Social Media Strategy
  • Social media monitoring
  • NEW: Content Marketing
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Google+
  • Blogging
  • Instagram
  • Youtube
  • NEW: Social Media Automation
  • NEW: Social for customer services
  • NEW: Social for PR

This course will take you from social zero to social hero using our proactive and practical approach. It is arguably one the most comprehensive online courses of social media; giving learners a great grounding and skill set to enter the world of social.

Certificate of completion

All students who complete this course will receive a FREE digital 'Certificate of social media marketing' issued by the SO ME Academy, alongside Udemy's own certificate of completion.

DON'T FORGET: Udemy operates a 30 day full money back guarantee, no questions asked! If you're not happy with this course you can request your money back.

Click the "take this course" button straight away at the top right of this page to unlock the power of social media for your business.
title: Social Media Marketing 2016 - Complete Certificate Course
